amendment.description: To repeal the requirement for reduction of survivor annuities under the Survivor Benefit Plan by veterans' dependency and indemnity compensation.

action.text: Amendment SA 3073 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(f) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3073.
Motion to waive section 302(f) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 3073 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 34. Record Vote Number: 216.
Amendment SA 3073 ruled out of order by the chair.
